game.name: City Car Driving
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, VR 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: City Car Driving – realistic car driving simulator, which will help you master the basic skills of the car driving in various traffic conditions, with plunging into the environment most closely resembling the real one.
game.shortDescriptionEn: City Car Driving – realistic car driving simulator, which will help you master the basic skills of the car driving in various traffic conditions, with plunging into the environment most closely resembling the real one.

reviewHighlights.text: 사각지대가 너무 많아 힘들다. 시야조절이 힘들다. 그러나 재밌고 미션들도 좋다.
